thread.title: Happy Customer
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Happy Customer

author: Happy Customer
title: Happy Customer
text: After spending three heavy-lidded hours with a different program (which was not funny, despite "Comedy" being part of the title), I switched to "Traffic School 4 Busy People". It was much easier to read (without putting me to sleep), and the fact that I could log in and out (during breaks at work) helped me finish on time. Thank you!
